Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraRepl
Namespace: "urn:zimbraRepl"
ReplicationStatus SOAP Command

Report on replication status

Network edition only API TRUE
Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required true

ReplicationStatusRequest

    <ReplicationStatusRequest /> ## ReplicationStatusRequest

ReplicationStatusResponse

    <ReplicationStatusResponse replicationEnabled="{replication-enabled-flag} (0|1)"
                                  [currentRole="{current-role-master|slave}"] [originalRole="{original-role-master|slave}"]> ## ReplicationStatusResponse
        <masterStatus masterOperatingMode="{master-operating-mode-invalid|normal|slaveless|catchup}"> ## ReplicationMasterStatus
            <catchupStatus remainingFiles="{num-remaining-files} (int)" remainingBytes="{num-remaining-bytes} (long)" /> ## ReplicationMasterCatchupStatus
         </masterStatus>
        <slaveStatus> ## ReplicationSlaveStatus
            <catchupStatus remainingOps="{num-pending-redo-operations} (int)"
                               remainingFiles="{num-remaining-files} (int)" remainingBytes="{num-remaining-bytes} (long)" /> ## ReplicationSlaveCatchupStatus
         </slaveStatus>
    </ReplicationStatusResponse>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <ReplicationStatusResponse> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
@replicationEnabled Required (only 1) Type:0|1
Flags whether replication is enabled
@currentRole Optional (0 or 1) Type:String
Current role - master|slave
@originalRole Optional (0 or 1) Type:String
Original role - master|slave
/masterStatus Optional (0 or 1) Master replication status. Only one of masterStatus and slaveStatus can be present
/masterStatus@masterOperatingMode Required (only 1) Type:String
Master's operating mode - invalid|normal|slaveless|catchup
/masterStatus/catchupStatus Optional (0 or 1) Catchup status
/masterStatus/catchupStatus@remainingFiles Required (only 1) Type:int
Number of remaining files
/masterStatus/catchupStatus@remainingBytes Required (only 1) Type:long
Number of remaining bytes
/slaveStatus Optional (0 or 1) Slave replication status
/slaveStatus/catchupStatus Optional (0 or 1) Catchup status
/slaveStatus/catchupStatus@remainingOps Required (only 1) Type:int
Number of pending redo operations
/slaveStatus/catchupStatus@remainingFiles Required (only 1) Type:int
Number of remaining files
/slaveStatus/catchupStatus@remainingBytes Required (only 1) Type:long
Number of remaining bytes
